name: Wander Design System
description:
As I developed my website, I need a system that integrates all of my design and visualize my concept in the similar fashion. I called it "Wander design system"


Brief on this system:

  • Brand guidelines (personal brand framework)
  • Website Moodboard
  • 4 iteration wireframe
  • fully customized and regrouped components
  • and many more
